patthana18.2:1.1_0: Hetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.2:2.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana18.2:3.1_0: Hetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.2:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.2:5.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
